handoff_data.summary: Completed comprehensive destination analysis for autumn Thailand tours, including detailed insights and market recommendations for September and October departures, pricing from 25000 RUB. Prepared use of Unsplash imagery.
handoff_data.context_for_next: Use destination and market analysis files for content blocks. Emphasize price from 25000 RUB, optimal travel months (September and October), vibrant real Unsplash imagery. Leverage emotional triggers and key booking insights.
